title: Replace header logo with uploaded neon green arrow design

requirements.text: Replace the header logo image element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1] in the Layout component with the uploaded image file showing the neon green arrow design and 'LEARNING VIDEOS' text
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo image is replaced with the uploaded neon green arrow design
The logo displays correctly at the top left of the header
The image maintains proper dimensions and alignment within the header layout
The logo is visible on both mobile and desktop views

constraints: Use the exact uploaded image file provided by the user
Update only the image element at the specified XPath location
Maintain existing header layout and styling
nonGoals: Modifying other header elements beyond the logo image
Changing the header layout or navigation structure
